name: VolcanoContainment
description:
Hey,

welcome to my Ludum Dare 49 game. 

Collect the volcano extinguishers before the timer expires, or the unstable volcano erupts. They spawn one after the other. How long can you survive?

Controls: WASD and mouse look

Left Mouse Button: Hookshot: Pull yourself towards flying debris or the white markings on static platforms.

Space: Jump. Hold Jump while hookshooting, to instantly jump from your target and get a small speed boost.

O: for options. Here you can turn of the music and change the mouse sensitivity, also you can enable exploration to play without time pressure :)
